name: Weedle
description: The Hairy Bug Pokémon. Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: Once per long rest, this Pokémon can ignore a negative status condition that results from an enemy move.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be the target of an attack of opportunity.
